Text: CHF Leadership Forum Actions Plans and FollowupHey Sally This note got kicked back to me when I tried to send it to you yesterday so hopefully it will make it through this time Thank you for your wonderful letter explaining your decision to stay and display visible leadership during this very difficult period I read an excerpt of it to the group and everyones hearts were with you You were greatly missed but of course we all understood and supported your decision It was wonderful meeting you and I thank you for your wonderful contributions to the first session I hope once things stabilize a bit youll have a chance to reengage with the group With all best wishes Margaret Vaughan Hello everyone Congratulations on a great Forum It was an immense pleasure meeting and working with all of you over these last two months Attached is a Word document containing the action plans created in the second session in the areas of InclusionDiversity Quality of Place Education Leadership and Business Retention Betty Alexander will of course be getting the complete report to you in a week and a half or so However we wanted to give those of you who were not able to attend the second session or had to leave early an opportunity right away to engage with the plans that were generated someone from the group will be giving you a call in the next week to go over these plans with you In the meantime please look over the attached document and see where you might want to join in there is plenty of room for volunteers in a number of areas For instance Gaurdie Banister and Brian Landrum are looking for volunteers to help them move the InclusionDiversity initiative forward and opportunities abound in the area for Education to aid with the Teacher Network James Calaway and the Annenberg High School of the Future project Jonathon Day Also Ron Lewis and Sally Jeffcoat are looking for people passionate about enhancing Houstons social services to join their working group at The Center To volunteer for any of the initiatives laid out in the action plans please contact Marilou and she will get you plugged in Again it was a great pleasure and honor working with you and I look forward to following your efforts to bring forth a fantastic future for Houston All the best Margaret Vaughan Leadership Forum I Action Plansdoc
